title: Just got LeaverBusted and put on extended queue because someone else dodged.
body: I've been playing for a while today, got kinda annoyed at one point and did dodge one match where I had gotten autofilled. (no point playing out a guaranteed loss and getting more tilted.) Come back a bit later, get into a new lobby, reach the countdown before match starts, and someone _else_ dodges. I'm now on 30-minute low-priority queue. Racking up wrongful punishments isn't exactly a great way to un-tilt after a bad day of Ranked. Any help?

replies.body: That sounds super frustrating to be honest! Your issue could be happening due to a bad Connection to the Server. It's pretty common, but our[ Connection Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)should get your client under control so that you can enjoy a game with no issues! After you're done running through the guide make sure to test it out in a custom match and let me know if you run into any issues.
Update: Finally got through my 30-miunte timer, and it happened again. Evidently selecting my Champion somehow forces me to dodge, completely outside my own control.
